page.title: 01The Hexton Area
page.content: Our area lies on the County border between the small towns of Hitchin in Hertfordshire and Barton in Bedfordshire which are linked by a busy main road. Hexton village lies at the heart of the peace and tranquility of this rural area and the family who own most of it and the surrounding land, play a big part in the life of the village. The chalky farm land is used mainly for forestry and the raising of cearal crops. The land is hilly which makes hard work for the farmers.Lots of people visit the area to walk the many footpaths and climb the hills, enjoying the beautiful countryside. The area is carefully looked after to preserve the attractive buildings. Nature reserves have been established to encourage wild animals and rare flowers to flourish.
